constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA CA39 : Brockwell Park Conservation Area
NHP Herne Hill Neighbourhood Area In Lambeth

application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - x1 Mature Apple. Ivy severed at base. Crown previously lifted. Recommendation: Remove Ivy from crown.T2 - x1 Semi Mature Ash. Tree growing against low boundary wall. Cracks evident. Tree may need to be removed in time. Retention is possible if wall rebuilt to accommodate tree. Recommendaton: Remove secondary basal stem adjacent.T4 - x1 Young Hawthorn. Recommendation: Formative prune T6 - x1 Mature Lime. Previously reduced and cut back over school grounds. Ivy removed. Recommendation: Remove dead wood T8 - x1 Mature Lime. Previously pollarded. Close to corner of boundary wall. Recommendation: Repollard T9 - x1 Mature Hore Chestnut. Previously thinned and Ivy removed. Recommendation: Remove low branch crossing rear boundary back to source. Carry out climbing inspection.T10 - x1 Yew. Tree is in rapid decline. Fell to ground level and grind stump T11 - x1 Lime. Old Pollard grown on to form a more natural form. Dead wood throughout. Putting pressure on the adjacent boundary wall which has cracks and is leaning. Recommendation: Remove dead wood over 50mm.T12 - x1 Semi Mature Lime. Old Pollard grown on to form a more natural form. Suppressed by adjacent trees. Putting pressure on the adjacent boundary wall which is leaning. Recommendation: Remove dead wood and Pollard back to knuckle at 5m.T13 - x1 Mature Lime. Old Pollard grown on to form a more natural form. Dead wood throughout crown. Putting pressure on the adjacent boundary wall which is leaning. Recommendation: Remove dead wood over 50mm.T14 - Mature Ash. Narrow specimen. Pushing up surrounding paving. Recommendation: Remove dead wood over 50mm. Carry out climbing inspection.T15 - x1 Mature Lime. Previously pollarded at 4m. Recommendation: Repollard
